aiCelebration21Day.one:
### Congratulations! üéâ

You've maintained the habit **{habitNames}** for 21 consecutive days! This is a crucial milestone for making an action automatic. Keep up the great work!

aiCelebration66Day.one:
### Incredible Achievement! üèÜ

You've reached 66 days with the habit **{habitNames}**! Science suggests this is the point where a new behavior becomes truly ingrained. You've built a solid foundation for lasting change.

aiErrorGeneric: An error occurred while communicating with the AI. Please try again later.
aiOptionHistoricalDesc: A complete overview of your entire journey.
aiOptionMonthlyDesc: A reflection on available data (max 30 days).
aiOptionQuarterlyDesc: A consolidated view of the last 90 days.
aiSystemInstruction: You are a Stoic Sage, a habit mentor who values consistency over perfection and focus on what we can control (our actions). Your response MUST be in {languageName}. Use markdown. The habit history uses these symbols: ‚úÖ for Completed, ‚ö™Ô∏è for Pending, and ‚û°Ô∏è for Snoozed.
appSubtitle: Act until you become, you are the sum of your habits.
confirmEndHabit: Are you sure you want to end the habit "{habitName}" starting from {date}? It will no longer appear on this or any future dates.
confirmHabitMove: You moved "{habitName}" from {oldTime} to {newTime}. Apply this change just for today, or from now on?
confirmInvalidKeyBody: The entered key does not appear to be a valid UUID. Sync keys usually have a format like '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'. Do you wish to proceed anyway?
confirmPermanentDelete: This will permanently delete the habit '{habitName}' and all of its history. This action cannot be undone. Do you wish to continue?
confirmRemoveTimePermanent: Permanently remove the {time} slot for "{habitName}" from now on?
confirmResetApp: This will permanently delete ALL your habits and progress data. This action cannot be undone. Do you wish to continue?
confirmSyncDisable: Are you sure you want to disable sync? You will no longer be able to access your data on other devices, and new data will not be saved to the cloud.
confirmSyncOverwrite: The data in the cloud is different from your local data. Do you want to overwrite your local data with the cloud data?
importError: Import failed. Please check if the file is a valid backup.
importInvalid: Import failed. The selected file does not appear to be a valid Askesis backup.
modalEditFormNotice: Please give the habit a name and select at least one time of day.
modalNotesTextareaPlaceholder: Type your note about this habit for the selected day...
noticeDuplicateHabitWithName: A habit with this name already exists.
noticeHabitAlreadyExistsInTime: The habit '{habitName}' is already active at: {times}.
noticeNameTooLong: Max 16 characters. Use a succinct description.
notificationChangePending: The change will take effect after restarting the app.
notificationStatusDisabled: Notifications are blocked. You need to change permissions in your browser settings.
syncActiveDesc: Cloud sync is active on this device.
syncConflictDescription: We detected different data in the cloud. If you've been working offline, choose 'Keep Local' to save your progress.
syncInactiveDesc: Save your data to the cloud to access it on any device.
syncWarning: WRITE THIS KEY DOWN! It's the only way to access your data on other devices. If you lose it, your cloud data is lost forever.
